description: Snapchat-style producer-to-producer track sharing platform with real-time visual playback, presence awareness, and networking

phases.phase1_infrastructure: Project setup, Next.js, database schema, auth, design system
phases.phase2_upload: Track upload, transcoding, waveform generation, storage
phases.phase3_snaps: Snap creation, expiration, passcodes, link generation
phases.phase4_player: Landing page player, visual experience, WebAudio
phases.phase9_dj: DJ features: BPM/key detection, B2B matching, crate sharing
